name: Swim Classes - Level 2
description: This class builds on the basic aquatic skills and water safety skills and concepts learned in level 1. Participants begin to perform skills at a slightly more advanced level and begin gaining rudimentary propulsive skills on both the front and the back. This level marks the beginning of independent aquatic locomotion skills. - Prerequisite- Completion of Level 1. - Children must be 48" to participate. - Registration is limited to one swim class per participant.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
address: Geary and Steiner Street, San Francisco, CA, 94115
